#!/bin/bash

function check_user_credentials {

    local password=$2
    local stored_username="admin"
    local stored_password="secret"
    if [ "$username" == "$stored_username" ]; then
        if [ "$password" == "$stored_password" ]; then
            echo "success"
            return 0  # Changed to 0 for success, conventionally
        else
            echo "Wrong password"
            return 1  # Changed to 1 for failure, conventionally
        fi
    else
        echo "Unknown username"

}

    else
